channel.title: DestinyX || 200+ Members || Custom Items || Custom Npc
channel.description:
[B]DestinyX is an upcoming RuneScape Private Server, filled with CUSTOM ITEMS around such as the Flaming Godsword, Armageddon, Salvation, Flame Whip and much much more! You can experience this brand new server my downloading the client [URL=http://"http://destiny-x.org/download/DestinyX.jar"][color=black][b]HERE[/b][/color][/URL]. Otherwise, you can use our [URL=http://destiny-x.org/webclient/webclient.html][color=black][b]WEBCLIENT[/b][/color][/URL] I really hope you enjoy your stay and experience at DestinyX and to see you in game![/B]
Kind Regards! ~Shez Owner
[CENTER][size=12pt][b]Welcome To DestinyX est 2012[/b][/size][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"http://www.destiny-x.org"]DestinyX Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://"http://destiny-x.org/forums/forum.php"]FORUMS[/URL] [URL=http://"http://destiny-x.org/forums/register.php"]REGISTER[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://destiny-x.org/webclient/webclient.html"]WEBCLIENT[/URL] [URL=http://"http://destiny-x.org/download/DestinyX.jar"]DESKTOP CLIENT[/URL]
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER] Features:
~Dedicated 24/7 Server ~Double xp weekends ~Double Xp Rings ~Active Players ~Very Friendly & Active Community ~Daily/Weekly Updates ~Excellent & Stable Economy ~Unique Dungeoneering+Slaying System (Never Been Released Before) ~100% Farming ~Polypore Dungeon (Ganodermics+Polypore included) ~100% Working Custom Fight Caves/Fight Kiln ~Perfected Pking And Perfected Switching. ~Custom Npcs Such as Prince Black Dragon ~Custom Thieving System Never Been Attempted Before. ~ALL SKILLS ARE TRAINABLE. (85% Construction) ~Dragon Slayer Quest. ~Barrows ~Dominion Tower ~Donator/Super/Platinum/Extreme Zone ~100% Dicing ~Flower Game ~All Prayers Working (Curses included) ~All updated amour/Switchitemslook ~Loyalty Program (with lots of different aura shops)
[img]http://gyazo.com/a6546342fb140c998a270c8caade5097[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/a1fba6df28213d66641895e793a0948e[/img]
[img]http://prntscr.com/1qdcd9[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/406104c554863aba90c2893a5f42afe9[/img]
P.S - im host 'shezf123' on rune-server.

item.title: DestinyX || 200+ Members || Custom Items || Custom Npc
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

It seems that your website and your client have been suspended from your webhost. I’ll give you 24 hours to resolve the issue and have at least a functioning download client before I need to lock this thread, at which point, you can message me at any time with functioning download links and/or a website and I’ll unlock the advertisement for you.
Thanks, and good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: DestinyX || 200+ Members || Custom Items || Custom Npc
